description:
### 11.43 colortemperature

Adjust color temperature in video to simulate variations in ambient color
temperature.

The filter accepts the following options:

**temperature**

    Set the temperature in Kelvin. Allowed range is from 1000 to 40000. Default value is 6500 K. 

**mix**

    Set mixing with filtered output. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. Default value is 1. 

**pl**

    Set the amount of preserving lightness. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. Default value is 0.
name: colortemperature

options.description: Set the temperature in Kelvin. Allowed range is from 1000 to 40000. Default value is 6500 K.
options.name: temperature

options.description: Set mixing with filtered output. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. Default value is 1.
options.name: mix

options.description: Set the amount of preserving lightness. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. Default value is 0.
options.name: pl
